short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension for Fallen London adds a 'Library' category to your inventory.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This unofficial (and awaiting approval by Failbetter) extension adds a 'Library' category to the inventory and moves some of your written work out of the 'Curiosity' section.
